alert.note: Alert for Boone; De Kalb; Ogle; Winnebago (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 9:51PM CDT until April 15 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Ogle County in north central Illinois... Northwestern De Kalb County in north central Illinois... Winnebago County in north central Illinois... Boone County in north central Illinois... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 950 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Polo to near Malta, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rockford, Belvidere, Loves Park, Machesney Park, Roscoe, Rochelle, South Beloit, Rockton, Poplar Grove, Byron, Oregon, Mount Morris, Polo, Rockford Airport, Candlewick Lake, Cherry Valley, Winnebago, Davis Junction, Pecatonica and Kirkland. Including the following interstates... I-39 between mile markers 97 and 123. I-88 between mile markers 75 and 89. I-90 between mile markers 1 and 31. This includes... Boone County Fairgrounds, Castle Rock State Park, Lowden State Park, Ogle County Fairgrounds, Rock Cut State Park, Rock Valley College, Rockford Rivets Baseball, Rockford Speedway, White Pines State Park, and Winnebago County Fairgrounds. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
